data.title: Rich and successful Yul Edochie: who are his parents?
data.meta_description: Rich and successful Yul Edochie: who are his parents? Yul Edochie has gained popularity in Nigeria over the last years due to his fantastic acting. Apparently, the fact that he comes from an acting...
data.text:
Yul Edochie has gained popularity in Nigeria over the last years due to his fantastic acting. Apparently, the fact that he comes from an acting family helped him too. Especially when his father is the legendary Pete Edochie himself! So, what about his parents? Who is Yul Edochie’s mother? We’ve got all the interesting information about this talented actor!

This actor was born in 1982, which makes him 35 years old. He was born into a large family, he has five older siblings. His full name is Yul Chibuike Daniel Edochie. The boy was named after the famous actor Yul Brynner, so acting was basically his destiny. He pursued his primary and secondary education in Enugu, and later in life, began mastering acting.

Yul Edochie has a degree in Theatre Arts. The first movie he acted in was called “The Exquires”. However, fame came to him in 2007, when he appeared in the movie “Wind of Glory”. The actor has founded his own academy for young actors and actresses. The Yul Edochie Academy was opened in Lagos in 2015. He personally shares his experience with the students and helps them to achieve success.

What about Yul Edochie’s personal life? Here you can find more information about Yul Edochie’S parents, who quite honestly are no less interesting personalities than their son.

Yul Edochie mother and father

Everyone in Nigeria knows Yul Edochie’s father, the famous veteran actor Pete Edochie. This man has been starring in movies for about fifty years, and there is absolutely no wonder that he became loved and respected by Nigerians. The real fame came to him when he played a leading role in “Things Fall Apart”, which is considered one of his most prominent works. He has starred in more than 60 movies. Pete Edochie is an Igbo man and a Catholic.

Pete Edochie is married to the sweetheart of many years, Josephine Edochie, and according to his words, he never thought of being with any other woman since he met her. She is the mother of his six children and she’s still by his side.

READ ALSO: Pete Edochie wife and children

Pete Edochie

Who is Yul Edochie’s mother?

Yul Edochie’s mother is Josephine Edochie, wife of his famous father Pete Edochie. Josephine prefers to stay away from the spotlight, but according to Pete’s words, she always supports him and their children in whatever they decide to do. Also, Yul’s brother, Linc Edochie, is a well-known Nollywood movie maker, director, and producer, and he acts in films too. Other siblings do not seem to follow their famous father’s footsteps. Only Yul and Linc are currently involved in acting.

Yul’s daughter, Dani, with his parents Pete and Josephine

There were rumors circulating around Nollywood that brought up the famous actress Rita Edochie. Some Nollywood fans assumed that she was married to Pete Edochie, and they began asking if Rita Edochie is Yul Edochie’s mother? The gossips appeared mainly because Pete Edochie’s real wife, Josephine, rarely shows up with him in the spotlight and is not involved in the movie industry.

Yul Edochie and his mother Josephine Edochie

When journalists had an interview with Rita and asked her this question, she denied the rumors, stating that her real husband is not Pete, but his younger brother Tony. Rita and Tony had a traditional Igbo wedding, which meant that she was automatically related to Tony’s family. So, she said that technically Pete is her husband too because in case something happens to his brother, he will be the one who will have to take care of Rita’s family according to the traditions.

However, she is happy with her husband Tony, and Pete Edochie is happy with his wife Josephine, who is Yul Edochie mother and the mother of his five siblings. She did a huge job raising so many kids and bringing them up to be decent people.

Rita Edochie

Yul Edochie family

Yul Edochie is happily married too – he met his wife, May Aligwe-Edochie, at the early age. They got married at the age of 22. Not much is known about May, she prefers to keep her life private and stay off the media. Yul once said that his wife is a successful businesswoman and talented computer engineer. He often speaks about her in the interviews, which makes clear that Yul loves his wife.

Yul Edochie with his wife May

They have three children together – daughter Dani and sons Karl and Kambi.

Yul Edochie with daughter Dani

We wish Yul Edochie and his family happiness and love forever. friendly forever.
